name: UCKeyToCharTableIndex
desc: Provides a count of, and offsets to, key-code-to-character tables in a 'uchr' resource.

items.name: init(keyToCharTableIndexFormat: UInt16, keyToCharTableSize: UInt16, keyToCharTableCount: UInt32, keyToCharTableOffsets: (UInt32))
var keyToCharTableCount: UInt32
items.desc: An unsigned 32-bit integer specifying the number of key-code-to-character tables, typically 6 to 12.

items.name: var keyToCharTableIndexFormat: UInt16
items.desc: An unsigned 16-bit integer identifying the format of the UCKeyToCharTableIndex structure. Set to kUCKeyToCharTableIndexFormat.

items.name: var keyToCharTableOffsets: (UInt32)
items.desc: An array of offsets from the beginning of the 'uchr' resource to each of the UCKeyOutput key-code-to-character tables in the keyToCharData[] array that follows this structure in the resource.

items.name: var keyToCharTableSize: UInt16
items.desc: An unsigned 16-bit integer specifying the number of virtual key codes supported by this resource; for ADB keyboards this is 128 (with virtual key codes ranging from 0 to 127).
